UpdateDerivedGeometries(..)
  Updates the derived geometry for the specified examination.
  Parameters:
    RoiNames - The ROIs to update.
    Examination - The target examination.
    Algorithm - Defines if the logical set operations use 
      contour or voxel based methods. 
      Margins (expand/contract) and Wall operations are always 
      performed using voxel based methods.
                  
      Possible values:
      * Auto: Automatically select algorithm mode.
      * Contours: Use contour based methods.
      * Voxels: Use voxel based methods.
      Default value is "Auto".
    AreEmptyDependenciesAllowed - If empty dependencies are 
      not allowed the resulting derived status will be set to 'Needs 
      update'
      if any of the geometries that an ROI depends on are empty.

CreateArcBeam.description:
CreateArcBeam(..)
  Creates and adds a beam of VMAT type.
  Parameters:
    ArcStopGantryAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    ArcRotationDirection - Rotation direction of the gantry.
      * Clockwise
      * CounterClockwise
    Energy - Energy for this beam (MV).
    IsocenterData - Dictionary containing isocenter data. Use 
      help functions to create IsocenterData. 
      Example: IsocenterData = beam_set.GetIsocenterData(Name="Iso 
      1") or IsocenterData = 
      beam_set.CreateDefaultIsocenterData(Position={'x':1, 'y':2, 
      'z':3} )
    Name - Beam name, must be unique.
    Description - Description.
    GantryAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CouchAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CollimatorAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.

DeleteBeam.description:
DeleteBeam(..)
  Deletes a beam from the beam list.
  Parameters:
    BeamName - The name of the beam that shall be deleted.

CreatePhotonBeam.description:
CreatePhotonBeam(..)
  Creates and adds a a photon beam.
  Parameters:
    Energy - Energy of the beam (MV).
    IsocenterData - Dictionary containing isocenter data. Use 
      help functions to create IsocenterData. 
      Example: IsocenterData = beam_set.GetIsocenterData(Name="Iso 
      1") or IsocenterData = 
      beam_set.CreateDefaultIsocenterData(Position={'x':1, 'y':2, 
      'z':3} )
    Name - Beam name, must be unique.
    Description - Description.
    GantryAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CouchAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CollimatorAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.

CreateElectronBeam.description:
CreateElectronBeam(..)
  Creates and adds a beam of electron type.
  Parameters:
    ApplicatorName - Name of the electron applicator.
    Energy - Energy [MeV] of the beam.
    InsertName - Name of the collimating insert in the 
      applicator.
    IsAddCutoutChecked - Gets, sets if cutout should be added
    IsocenterData - Dictionary containing isocenter data. Use 
      help functions to create IsocenterData. 
      Example: IsocenterData = beam_set.GetIsocenterData(Name="Iso 
      1") or IsocenterData = 
      beam_set.CreateDefaultIsocenterData(Position={'x':1, 'y':2, 
      'z':3} )
    Name - Beam name, must be unique.
    Description - Description.
    GantryAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CouchAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CollimatorAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.

SetDoseSpecificationPoint.description:
SetDoseSpecificationPoint(..)
  Select a dose specification point for this beam.
  Parameters:
    Name - The name of an existing dose specification point, 
      or "Isocenter" to use isocenter.

SetIsocenter.description:
SetIsocenter(..)
  Sets an isocenter to a beam. If the name of the isocenter does 
  not exist, a new isocenter will be created.
              
  Example:
   beam_set.Beams[0].SetIsocenter(Name="New iso")
  Parameters:
    Name - Name of the isocenter

SetArcTrajectory.description:
SetArcTrajectory(..)
  Sets the arc trajectory on a beam.
  Example: 
    beam_set.Beams[0].SetArcTrajectory(GantryAngles=[198, 230, 282, 
  ], CouchAngles=[10, 0, 20, ], CollimatorAngles=[0, 0, 0], 
  ArcRotationDirection="Clockwise")
  Parameters:
    GantryAngles - Gantry angles defining the wave arc.
    CouchAngles - Couch angles defining the wave arc.
    CollimatorAngles - Collimator angles defining the wave arc.
    ArcRotationDirection - Rotation direction for the wave 
      arc. Possible values:
      * None
      * Clockwise
      * CounterClockwise

GetDRRImage.description:
GetDRRImage()
  Method for retrieving DRR image for a treatment beam or a setup 
  beam.
  Returns:
    Filename for the created image.

SetIsocenterToMidpointInExternal.description:
SetIsocenterToMidpointInExternal()
  Sets the isocenter for a beam to the midplane of the patient 
  (external).
              
  Example:
   beam_set.Beams[0].SetIsocenterToMidpointInExternal()

CenterBeamInField.description:
CenterBeamInField()
  Centers the beam (including jaws, MLC and block) around the 
  isocenter.

SetInitialJawPositions.description:
SetInitialJawPositions(..)
  Sets initial jaw positions to the beam.
  Parameters:
    X1 - X1 - Left jaw.
    X2 - X2 - Right jaw.
    Y1 - Y1 - Top jaw.
    Y2 - Y2 - Bottom jaw.

DeleteArcTrajectory.description:
DeleteArcTrajectory()
  Deletes the arc trajectory on a beam. 
  Example:
    beam_set.Beams[0].DeleteArcTrajectory()

SetBeamNP.description:
SetBeamNP(..)
  Method for setting the ion beam meterset in units of Number of 
  Particles
  Parameters:
    NumberOfParticles - The number of particles to set for the 
      ion beam.

SetBolus.description:
SetBolus(..)
  Sets the bolus with name BolusName on this photon beam. Returns 
  the beam.
  Parameters:
    BolusName - Name of the bolus.

GetBEVImage.description:
GetBEVImage(..)
  Method for retrieving BEV image for a beam.
  Parameters:
    ShowFluence - Show fluence or not.
  Returns:
    Filename for the created image.

SetBlockTray.description:
SetBlockTray(..)
  Sets a block tray on this photon beam. Returns the beam.
  Parameters:
    ID - Id of the block tray
    Transmission - Transmission of the block tray

GetBeamNP.description:
GetBeamNP()
  Method for retrieving the ion beam meterset in units of Number 
  of Particles
  Returns:
    The Number of Particles for the beam

DeleteSegment.description:
DeleteSegment(..)
  Deletes a segment.
  Parameters:
    SegmentNumber - The number of the segment that shall be 
      deleted.

GetSSD.description:
GetSSD()
  Method for retrieving the source-to-surface distance for photon 
  and electron beams.
  Returns:
    The source-to-surface distance in cm.

SetPhotonBlock.description:
SetPhotonBlock(..)
  Sets a block on this photon beam. Returns the beam.
  Parameters:
    Name - Name of the block.
    Type - Type of the block
    Transmission - Block transmission

EditIsocenter.description:
EditIsocenter(..)
  Edits any or all of the following isocenter parameters for the 
  beam.
              
  Examples: 
  Edit only the name:
    beam_set.Beams[0].Isocenter.EditIsocenter(Name="New iso")
  Edit the name, color and position:
    beam_set.Beams[0].Isocenter.EditIsocenter(Name="New Name", 
  Color="Red", Isocenter={'x':0, 'y':0, 'z':7} )
  Parameters:
    Name - Name of the isocenter
    Color - Color of the isocenter
    Position - Position of the isocenter

SetArcTrajectoryFromTemplate.description:
SetArcTrajectoryFromTemplate(..)
  Sets the arc trajectory on a beam from a template.
  Example:
    
  beam_set.Beams[0].SetArcTrajectoryFromTemplate(NameOfTemplate="L5 
  lung")
  Parameters:
    NameOfTemplate - Name of Wave Arc Template to set to beam.

CreateRectangularField.description:
CreateRectangularField(..)
  Creates rectangular field.
  Parameters:
    Width - The width of the rectangular field in cm. Default 
      value is 1.0.
    Height - The height of the rectangular field in cm. 
      Default value is 1.0.
    CenterCoordinate - The center point of the rectangular 
      field in the beam coordinate system. 
      Default value is { 'x': 0, 'y': 0 }.
    MoveMLC - Indicates if the field should be collimated by 
      the MLC. Default value is true.
    MoveAllMLCLeaves - Indicates if all leafs should be moved 
      when adjusting MLC. Default value is false.
    MoveJaw - Indicates if the field should be collimated by 
      the jaws. Default value is true.
    JawMargins - The MLC to jaw margin in cm. Default value is 
      { 'x': 0, 'y': 0 }.
    DeleteWedge - Indicates if the wedge of the beam should be 
      deleted. Default value is false.
    PreventExtraLeafPairFromOpening - If an extra leafpair 
      should be openend, it can be prevented using this property.

CreatePBSIonBeam.description:
CreatePBSIonBeam(..)
  Creates and adds a beam of PBS (or Line scanning) ion type.
  Parameters:
    SnoutId - Snout ID of the beam. Must be specified.
    SpotTuneId - Name of the spot tune ID of the beam. Must be 
      specified.
    RangeShifter - Name of the range shifter of the beam. 
      Default value is null.
    MinimumAirGap - Minimun air gap from snout. Default value 
      is null.
    MetersetRateSetting - MetersetRateSetting for the beam. 
      Default value is null.
    IsocenterData - Dictionary containing isocenter data. Use 
      help functions to create IsocenterData. 
      Example: IsocenterData = beam_set.GetIsocenterData(Name="Iso 
      1") or IsocenterData = 
      beam_set.CreateDefaultIsocenterData(Position={'x':1, 'y':2, 
      'z':3} )
    Name - Beam name, must be unique.
    Description - Description.
    GantryAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CouchAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.
    CollimatorAngle - Angle unit and direction follow IEC.

CopyBeam.description:
CopyBeam(..)
  Creates a copy of the specified beam and appends the copy to the 
  beam list.
  Parameters:
    BeamName - The name of the beam that shall be copied.
